channel.title: Burns & Gambo
channel.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
channel.description: Burns and Gambo bring hard hitting opinions and the latest information on the Valley sports teams every afternoon. When news breaks, they are reacting to it and telling you what it means. Listen live every afternoon from 2-6 PM Arizona Time on Arizona Sports or download this podcast.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Burns and Gambo bring hard hitting opinions and the latest information on the Valley sports teams every afternoon. When news breaks, they are reacting to it and telling you what it means. Listen live every afternoon from 2-6 PM Arizona Time on Arizona Sports or download this podcast.
channel.itunes:summary: Burns and Gambo bring hard hitting opinions and the latest information on the Valley sports teams every afternoon. When news breaks, they are reacting to it and telling you what it means. Listen live every afternoon from 2-6 PM Arizona Time on Arizona Sports or download this podcast.

item.title: August 19, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: How big of a loss is Darnell Dockett and how do the Cardinals replace him? Kirk Gibson discusses his future with the D-backs and Johnny Manziel flips the bird.
item.description: How big of a loss is Darnell Dockett and how do the Cardinals replace him? Kirk Gibson discusses his future with the D-backs and Johnny Manziel flips the bird.

item.title: August 19, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Now that he's out for the season, will Darnell Dockett ever play for the Cardinals again? How should the Diamondbacks begin to rebuild their team, and should Kirk Gibson be a part of those plans?
item.description: Now that he's out for the season, will Darnell Dockett ever play for the Cardinals again? How should the Diamondbacks begin to rebuild their team, and should Kirk Gibson be a part of those plans?

item.title: August 18, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Jay Feely improved his kickoffs against Minnesota, but will it be enough to make the roster? Ted Larsen could be playing Jonathan Cooper out of a job and the 49ers may be in trouble.
item.description: Jay Feely improved his kickoffs against Minnesota, but will it be enough to make the roster? Ted Larsen could be playing Jonathan Cooper out of a job and the 49ers may be in trouble.

item.title: August 18, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Cardinals backup quarterback Drew Stanton discusses how he prepares, even though he may never step on the field and Darnell Dockett is carted off the field after an injury in Monday's practice.
item.description: Cardinals backup quarterback Drew Stanton discusses how he prepares, even though he may never step on the field and Darnell Dockett is carted off the field after an injury in Monday's practice.

item.title: August 15, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Jay Feely and Ryan Lindley could be down to their last chance to make the Cardinals roster Saturday against the Vikings. Tim Kurkjian discusses the new commissioner of Major League Baseball and Rich Rod isn't happy about the play from his quarterbacks.
item.description: Jay Feely and Ryan Lindley could be down to their last chance to make the Cardinals roster Saturday against the Vikings. Tim Kurkjian discusses the new commissioner of Major League Baseball and Rich Rod isn't happy about the play from his quarterbacks.

item.title: August 15, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Jerraud Powers talks about having to run sprints after Thursday's fight at training camp. Blake Bortles is making a strong case to be the Jaguars starting quarterback and NASCAR is changing their rules after the Kevin Ward Jr. tragedy.
item.description: Jerraud Powers talks about having to run sprints after Thursday's fight at training camp. Blake Bortles is making a strong case to be the Jaguars starting quarterback and NASCAR is changing their rules after the Kevin Ward Jr. tragedy.

item.title: August 14, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Now that John Abraham is in Cardinals camp, how soon will he be able to contribute? Why did the D-backs get rid of Trevor Bauer and what can the Cardinals expect out of linebacker Desmond Bishop?
item.description: Now that John Abraham is in Cardinals camp, how soon will he be able to contribute? Why did the D-backs get rid of Trevor Bauer and what can the Cardinals expect out of linebacker Desmond Bishop?

item.title: August 12, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Bruce Arians says that Tyrann Mathieu could be practicing within the week. The Suns and Eric Bledsoe haven't spoken in months and Kirk Gibson discusses how he's handling playing time at catcher.
item.description: Bruce Arians says that Tyrann Mathieu could be practicing within the week. The Suns and Eric Bledsoe haven't spoken in months and Kirk Gibson discusses how he's handling playing time at catcher.

item.title: August 12, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: The Royals are in first place and could be going to the playoffs for the first time in almost 30 years. Tuesday marks the 20th anniversary of the MLB strike and the quality of Pac-12 quarterbacks is overshadowing ASU's Taylor Kelly.
item.description: The Royals are in first place and could be going to the playoffs for the first time in almost 30 years. Tuesday marks the 20th anniversary of the MLB strike and the quality of Pac-12 quarterbacks is overshadowing ASU's Taylor Kelly.

item.title: August 11, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: The Cardinals looked good in their first preseason game of the year, especially quarterback Logan Thomas. Could Tony Stewart have avoided the dirt track tragedy and what is going on with all of the current and former Diamondbacks needing Tommy John surgery?
item.description: The Cardinals looked good in their first preseason game of the year, especially quarterback Logan Thomas. Could Tony Stewart have avoided the dirt track tragedy and what is going on with all of the current and former Diamondbacks needing Tommy John surgery?

item.title: August 11, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Rory McIlroy wins his fourth Major championship but does America care? Blake Bortles impresses in his NFL debut and the Cardinals have a competitive kicking battle taking place between Jay Feely and Chandler Catanzaro.
item.description: Rory McIlroy wins his fourth Major championship but does America care? Blake Bortles impresses in his NFL debut and the Cardinals have a competitive kicking battle taking place between Jay Feely and Chandler Catanzaro.

item.title: August 11, 2014 - Hour: 3
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Will Tony Stewart face charges for his role in the death of Kevin Ward Jr.? David Peralta is making a case for rookie of the year and the Cardinals are extremely deep at the wide receiver position.
item.description: Will Tony Stewart face charges for his role in the death of Kevin Ward Jr.? David Peralta is making a case for rookie of the year and the Cardinals are extremely deep at the wide receiver position.

item.title: August 11, 2014 - Hour: 4
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Logan Thomas surprises after a strong showing in his first NFL preseason game. Rory McIlroy wins another Major, but does America care? Blake Bortles impresses but still isn't being considered for the starting job in Jacksonville.
item.description: Logan Thomas surprises after a strong showing in his first NFL preseason game. Rory McIlroy wins another Major, but does America care? Blake Bortles impresses but still isn't being considered for the starting job in Jacksonville.

item.title: August 8, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: The D-backs have called up Jake Lamb and he makes his MLB debut. What should we watch for in the Cardinals' first preseason game and Adrian Wilson has nothing to prove.
item.description: The D-backs have called up Jake Lamb and he makes his MLB debut. What should we watch for in the Cardinals' first preseason game and Adrian Wilson has nothing to prove.

item.title: August 8, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: The Pac-12 is now on Snapchat. Is ASU getting a bargain when it comes to Todd Graham being their coach? Have the Lakers lost their luster?
item.description: The Pac-12 is now on Snapchat. Is ASU getting a bargain when it comes to Todd Graham being their coach? Have the Lakers lost their luster?

item.title: August 8, 2014 - Hour: 3
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: What will happen if the 49er's lose Colin Kaepernick? It looks like Logan Thomas will be making the Cardinals roster and autonomy for the Power 5 conferences in college football creates "haves" and "have-mores."
item.description: What will happen if the 49er's lose Colin Kaepernick? It looks like Logan Thomas will be making the Cardinals roster and autonomy for the Power 5 conferences in college football creates "haves" and "have-mores."

item.title: August 8, 2014 - Hour: 4
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: The D-backs are making roster moves. Is the youth movement beginning? Who should everyone look at in the first Cardinals' preseason game and is Tiger Woods trying to win Majors or make the cut?
item.description: The D-backs are making roster moves. Is the youth movement beginning? Who should everyone look at in the first Cardinals' preseason game and is Tiger Woods trying to win Majors or make the cut?

item.title: August 7, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: What does Kevin Love going to Cleveland do to the landscape of the NBA? The Cardinals Released Ernie Sims and the Power 5 conferences have been given more power by the NCAA.
item.description: What does Kevin Love going to Cleveland do to the landscape of the NBA? The Cardinals Released Ernie Sims and the Power 5 conferences have been given more power by the NCAA.

item.title: August 7, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Who had the best individual seasons in Pac-12 history? Jeremy Guthrie apologizes to teammate for getting him hit by a pitch and Cardinals defensive end Frostee Rucker talks about the upcoming NFL season.
item.description: Who had the best individual seasons in Pac-12 history? Jeremy Guthrie apologizes to teammate for getting him hit by a pitch and Cardinals defensive end Frostee Rucker talks about the upcoming NFL season.

item.title: August 7, 2014 - Hour: 3
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: The majority of college football coaches would prefer to play all games within the power 5 conferences. Cardinals tight end John Carlson talks about the upcoming season and Troy Tulowitzki speaks out on wanting to win.
item.description: The majority of college football coaches would prefer to play all games within the power 5 conferences. Cardinals tight end John Carlson talks about the upcoming season and Troy Tulowitzki speaks out on wanting to win.
